ygData.subject: Re: {quests} questions
ygData.msgSnippet: NOt as far as i know. though i havent done the Freeport quests yet. Though last i knew, the Paladins do not physically get the sir in front of their name.
ygData.messageBody:
NOt as far as i know. though i havent done the
Freeport quests yet.
Though last i knew, the Paladins do not physically get
the "sir" in front of their name. Its more of an
honorary title.
However they have been petitioning for that physical
title to be added to their name. Which i happen to
agree with, just as long as every other class gets one
as well.
With the new patch , though, this may have changed.

Bathory D'Allatu
Minions of Darkness
Cazic-Thule

--- rich.hitz@... wrote:
> From: rich.hitz@...
>

> I am new to this list and SKs in general. That out
> of the way...
> Is there an SK quest that will put the title "Sir"
> in front of your name like the Paladin "Test of
> Truth" in Freeport?
>
> --
> Phyrexian
> 2nd level DE SK
> Bertoxxulous
